忽.definition: to neglect; to overlook; to ignore; suddenly

忽冷忽熱.definition: now hot, now cold; (of one's mood, affection etc) to alternate

忽哨.definition: to whistle (with fingers in one's mouth); nowadays written 呼哨

忽必烈.definition: Khubilai Khan (1215-1294), grandson of Genghis Khan 成吉思汗, first Yuan dynasty emperor, reigned 1260-1294

忽忽.definition: fleeting (of quick passage time); in a flash; distracted manner; vacantly; frustratedly

忽忽悠悠.definition: indifferent to the passing of time; careless

忽悠.definition: to rock; to sway; to flicker (e.g. of lights reflected on water); to flutter (e.g. of a flag); to trick sb into doing sth; to dupe; to con

忽略.definition: to neglect; to overlook; to ignore

忽略不計.definition: to disregard (sth seen as negligible); to neglect (sth seen as insignificant)

忽聞.definition: to hear suddenly; to learn of sth unexpectedly

忽視.definition: to neglect; to overlook; to disregard; to ignore

忽閃.definition: to glitter; to gleam; to sparkle; to flash

忽隱忽現.definition: intermittent; now you see it, now you don't

忽魯謨斯.definition: old Chinese name for Hormuz; now called 霍爾木茲|霍尔木兹
